title: SynonymGraphFilterFactory doesn't display the name correctly in the admin analysis page
description:
I was trying to play around with SynonymGraphFilterFactory in Solr 6.5 to see how multi-word synonyms work. 

Attached is a screenshot where the name of SynonymGraphFilterFactory is displayed as "LBTS" which when you click on the tooltip reads ListBasedTokenStream.java . We should be able to display the correct name here

comments.content: Hmm. I don't see it anymore. Can't seem to figure out what I had different that was showing this. I see "SGF" now .
comments.author: Varun Thacker

comments.content: Looks like "Can't reproduce"! Can we close it now?
comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
